settings.title: How do I know which ring size I need?
settings.answer:
We have a few tips and tricks to help you find your perfect fit.

If you already own a ring that fits, simply measure the inner diameter of
the ring on a ruler (not including the edge). The measurement in
millimetres is your European ring size. 

You can also place the ring on the circles of our size guide – scaled to 100% and printed – to easily check. 

Alternatively, place the ring on these circles. The circle that matches the inner edge of the ring indicates your size. 

Without
using a ring, cut out and wrap our Amsterdam Vintage Jewels measurer
around your finger (scaled to 100% and printed). The number that meets
the dotted lines is your ring size. 

Our professionals are happy to help you too. Book an appointment at
Amsterdam Vintage Jewels HQ for expert assistance and to try on your
favourite rings.

Extra tips:

Every
finger is different and your fingers may differ in size on each hand.
Always measure your ring size on the finger you want to wear the ring
on. Take the thickness of the ring into account: the thicker the ring,
the tighter it will sit. With a very thick ring, take half a size bigger
and with a very thin ring, half a size smaller.

If you are in doubt between two sizes, take the larger size to be sure.

Only
measure your finger when your hands are at a normal temperature. Heat
and cold make your fingers vary in size. It helps to measure at two
different times on two different days to be sure you are right. 

If
you have a ring with a stone in mind, it’s even more important to
measure accurately so the stone doesn’t turn when you wear the ring.

We don’t accept returns of engraved items. Therefore, it’s best to fit a ring before you have it engraved.

Use this table to convert your ring size from circumference to diameter or vice versa.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: Which payment methods do you accept?
settings.answer: We accept iDeal, PayPal, Apple Pay, Mastercard, Visa and Klarna.
